text: @realDonaldTrump @USVInews Jesse asked some pertinent questions. I would like someone to ask him why he thought HCQ should be prescribed to patients sick with SARS a few years ago, but, discounts its effectiveness now. Successes now with HCQ, Zpak (antibiotic), and zinc. Why not recommend? #COVID19
